{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Home improvement {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Home improvement The concept of home improvement , home renovation , or remodeling is the process of renovating or making additions to one's home. Home improvement can consist of projects that upgrade an existing home interior (such as electrical and plumbing), exterior (masonry, concrete, siding, roofing) or other improvements to the property (i.e. garden work or garage maintenance/additions). Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Home improvement)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
